pages.text: $(li)The Shroomlight Tear is a fungus that can be found in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/nether/glowstone_canyon)Glowstone Canyon$(/l).$(br)$(li)This item can be used to breed $(l:patchouli:creatures/infernal_expansion/glowsquito)Glowsquitos$(/l).$(br)$(li)It can be used to craft $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/glowstone_block)Glowstone Blocks$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l)
